#summary Building companion9x on OS X

= Building companion9X on OS X =

= Prerequisites =
 * [https://developer.apple.com/ xcode 4.1]
 * [http://qt.nokia.com/downloads/qt-for-open-source-cpp-development-on-mac-os-x/ Qt]
 * [http://www.codesynthesis.com/products/xsd/download.xhtml xsd]
 * [http://www.libsdl.org/download-1.2.php SDL]
 * [http://www.cmake.org/cmake/resources/software.html cmake]
 * [http://xerces.apache.org/xerces-c/download.cgi xerces]
 * [http://www.obdev.at/products/crosspack/download.html avr]

== OS X 10.7.2 Lion ==
Note: Links to SDL package is for Intel CPU based machines. If you have powerPC find and download appropriate package from links above.
  
 # install [https://developer.apple.com/ installxcode_41_lion.dmg] and after running xcode go to _Preferences, Documentation_ and press _"Check and Install Now"_.
 # install [http://releases.qt-project.org/qt4/source/qt-mac-opensource-4.8.2.dmg qt-mac-opensource-4.8.2.dmg]
 # extract [http://www.codesynthesis.com/download/xsd/3.3/macosx/i686/xsd-3.3.0-i686-macosx.tar.bz2 xsd-3.3.0-i686-macosx.tar.bz2] to _/opt/local_
 # unpack [http://www.libsdl.org/release/SDL-1.2.15.tar.gz SDL-1.2.15.tar.gz] sources, configure, make and install them
{{{
cd SDL-1.2.15
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}

 # install [http://www.cmake.org/files/v2.8/cmake-2.8.8-Darwin64-universal.dmg cmake-2.8.8-Darwin64-universal.dmg]
 # unpack [http://tux.rainside.sk/apache//xerces/c/3/sources/xerces-c-3.1.1.tar.gz xerces-c-3.1.1.tar.gz] souces, configure, make and install them
{{{
cd xerces-c-3.1.1
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}

== UsbASP ==
Last needed thing is support for usb programer. 

Just install [http://www.obdev.at/downloads/crosspack/CrossPack-AVR-20120217.dmg CrossPack-AVR-20120217.dmg]

= Building companion9x =
Now let's download and make latest companion9x
{{{
cd ~
svn checkout http://companion9x.googlecode.com/svn/ companion9x
cd companion9x/trunk
mkdir xcode
cd xcode
cmake -G Xcode ../src
}}}

Start Xcode and open _companion9x.xcodeproj_ file located in _~/companion9x/trunk/xcode/_

*Run build scheme companion9x*

now you can run companion9x application located in _~/companion9x/trunk/xcode/Debug/companion9x.app_

or you can move _copmanion9x.app_ to your usual Application directory.
